titleStmt.title: Manzinie his most exquisite academicall discourses, upon severall choice subjects. Turned into French by that famous wit Monsieur de Scudery, Governour of Nostredame. And Englished by an honourable lady.
Furori della gioventu esercitii rhetorici. English
titleStmt.author: Manzini, Giovanni Battista, 1599-1664.
Scudéry, M. de (Georges), 1601-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Pauls Churchyard at the sign of the Princes Arms,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Furori della gioventu esercitii rhetorici.
Title page printed in red and black.
Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 19 1654"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
